name: eggshell
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] the hard outside covering of an egg
Achara Satayapaisal/EyeEm/GettyImages
[ U ] paint that is slightly shiny when it is dry and is used for painting walls and woodwork (= doors, window frames, etc.)
